body:
Fixed things up. Tests were previously failing since the scipy `halfnorm`'s first arg was not `scale` as I assumed, but `loc`, where loc is both the mean of the base distribution and the fold point.

Also I didn't end up using the bijector and subclassing `TransformedDistribution`, because the bijector wasn't passing through static shapes in `prob` and `log_prob`, meaning the static shape of the result was `<unknown>`.
